00036 // Just used to force the user to configure and get a device.
00037 class device;

00040 // create kernel call bindings
00041 template <typename T>
00042 class kernel_host_type<cupp::deviceT::memory1d<T> > {
00043         public:
00044                 typedef typename cupp::memory1d<T> type;
00045 };
00046 
00047 template <typename T>
00048 class kernel_device_type < cupp::memory1d<T> > {
00049         public:
00050                 typedef cupp::deviceT::memory1d<T> type;
00051 };

00064 template< typename T >
00065 class memory1d {
00066         typedef typename kernel_device_type< memory1d<T> >::type  device_type;
00067         public:
00072                 typedef std::size_t size_type;
00073 
00078                 typedef T value_type;
00079 
00080                 // dev is a pure dummy, it is only used to force the user to configure a device
00081                 // before creating memory on it.
00089                 memory1d( device const& dev, size_type size );
00090                 
00099                 memory1d( device const& dev, int init_value, size_type size );
00100                 
00110                 memory1d( device const& dev, T const* data, size_type size );
00111                 
00120                 template <typename InputIterator>
00121                 memory1d( device const& dev, InputIterator first, InputIterator last );
00122 
00129                 memory1d( memory1d<T> const& other );
00130 
00136                 ~memory1d();
00137 
00144                 memory1d< T >& operator=( const memory1d< T > &other );
00145 
00152                 void swap( memory1d& other );
00153                 
00154 
00160                 size_type size() const;
00161                 
00162 
00168                 void set( int value );
00169 
00170 
00179                 template <typename InputIterator>
00180                 void copy_to_device( InputIterator first, InputIterator last, int offset );
00181                 
00189                 void copy_to_device( T const* data, size_type offset=0 );
00190                 
00200                 void copy_to_device( size_type count, T const* data, size_type offset=0 );
00201 
00209                 void copy_to_device( memory1d const& other, size_type offset=0 );
00210                 
00219                 void copy_to_device( memory1d const& other, size_type count, size_type offset=0 );
00220                 
00221 
00228                 void copy_to_host( T* destination );
00229                 
00236                 template <typename OutputIterator>
00237                 void copy_to_host( OutputIterator out_iter );
00238 
00242                 shared_device_pointer<T> cuda_pointer() const {  return device_pointer_;  }
00243 
00244         
00249                 device_type get_host_based_device_copy(const device &d) const ;
00250 
00255                 shared_device_pointer< device_type > get_device_based_device_copy(const device &d) const;
00256                 
00260                 void dirty (const device &d, shared_device_pointer< device_type > device_copy) const {  }
00261 
00262 
00263         private:
00267                 shared_device_pointer<T> device_pointer_;
00268 
00272                 size_type size_;
00273 
00277                 mutable shared_device_pointer< device_type > device_proxy_;
00278 }; // class memory1d

00280 
00281 template <typename T>
00282 typename memory1d<T>::device_type memory1d<T>::get_host_based_device_copy(const device &d) const {
00283         return device_type (size(), cuda_pointer().get());
00284 }
00285 
00286 template <typename T>
00287 shared_device_pointer< typename memory1d<T>::device_type > memory1d<T>::get_device_based_device_copy(const device &d) const {
00288         if (device_proxy_.get()==0) {
00289                 // copy device_copy into global memory
00290                 shared_device_pointer < device_type > device_proxy ( cupp::malloc< device_type >() );
00291 
00292                 device_proxy_ = device_proxy;
00293 
00294                 deviceT::memory1d<T> copy = get_host_based_device_copy(d);
00296                 cupp::copy_host_to_device(device_proxy_, &copy);
00297         }
00298 
00299         return device_proxy_;
00300 }
00301

00303 template <typename T>
00304 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, size_type size ) : device_pointer_( cupp::malloc<T>(size) ), size_(size) {
00305 }
00306 
00307 
00308 template <typename T>
00309 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, int init_value, size_type size ) : device_pointer_( cupp::malloc<T>(size) ), size_(size) {
00310         set(init_value);
00311 }
00312 
00313 
00314 template <typename T>
00315 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, T const* data, size_type size ) : device_pointer_( cupp::malloc<T>(size) ), size_(size) {
00316         copy_to_device(data);
00317 }
00318 
00319 
00320 template <typename T>
00321 template <typename InputIterator>
00322 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, InputIterator first, InputIterator last ) {
00324         size_ = last - first;
00325         
00326         device_pointer_( cupp::malloc<T>(size_) );
00327         copy_to_device(first, last);
00328 }
00329 
00330 template <typename T>
00331 memory1d<T>::memory1d( memory1d<T> const& other ) : device_pointer_( cupp::malloc<T>(other.size()) ), size_(other.size()) {
00332         copy_to_device(other);
00333 }

00335 
00336 template <typename T>
00337 memory1d<T>::~memory1d() {
00338 }
00339 
00340 template <typename T>
00341 memory1d< T >& memory1d<T>::operator=( const memory1d< T > &other ) {
00342         copy_to_device(other);
00343 }
00344 
00345 
00346 template <typename T>
00347 void memory1d<T>::set(int value) {
00348         cupp::mem_set (device_pointer_, value, size());
00349 }
00350 
00351 
00352 template <typename T>
00353 template <typename InputIterator>
00354 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device( InputIterator first, InputIterator last, int offset ) {
00355         std::vector<T> temp;
00356         temp.assign(first, last);
00357         copy_to_device(temp.size(), &temp[0], offset);
00358 }
00359 
00360 
00361 template <typename T>
00362 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device( T const* data, size_type offset ) {
00363         copy_to_device(size(), data, offset);
00364 }
00365 
00366 
00367 template <typename T>
00368 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device( size_type count, T const* data, size_type offset) {
00369         if (count + offset > size()) {
00370                 throw exception::memory_access_violation();
00371         }
00372 
00374         cupp::copy_host_to_device (device_pointer_.get()+offset, data, count);
00375 }
00376 
00377 template <typename T>
00378 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device (memory1d const& other, size_type offset) {
00379         copy_to_device(other, other.size(), offset);
00380 }
00381 
00382 
00383 template <typename T>
00384 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device (memory1d const& other, size_type count, size_type offset) {
00385         if (count+offset > size()) {
00386                 throw exception::memory_access_violation();
00387         }
00388 
00390         cupp::copy_device_to_device (device_pointer_.get()+offset, other.device_pointer_, count);
00391 }
00392 
00393 
00394 template <typename T>
00395 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_host (T* destination) {
00396         cupp::copy_device_to_host (destination, device_pointer_, size() );
00397 }
00398 
00399 
00400 template <typename T>
00401 template <typename OutputIterator>
00402 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_host(OutputIterator out_iter) {
00403         std::vector<T> temp( size() );
00404 
00405         copy_to_host(&temp[0]);
00406 
00407         std::copy(temp.begin(), temp.end(), out_iter);
00408 }
00409 
00410 
00411 
00412 template <typename T>
00413 void memory1d<T>::swap( memory1d& other ) {
00414         swap(this.device_pointer_, other.device_pointer_);
00415         std::swap(this.size_, other.size_);
00416 }
00417 
00418 
00419 template <typename T>
00420 typename memory1d<T>::size_type memory1d<T>::size() const {
00421         return size_;
00422 }
